headline: HARDEN SUGGESTS LIMITED MONARCHY; Urges the Prussians to Remodel Their Government on Lines of the English. REVENTLOW IS DEPRESSED Fears Central Powers Are Weakening;-Kaiser's Reform Proposals Bring Easter Rejoicing. Promise Brings Rejoicing. Criticise Kiser's Concessions. Message Hailed by Vorwaerts. Predicts Salutary Effect Abroad. Called a Binding Pledge.

headline: GERMAN CRUELTY SEEN BY GERARD; Tells Canadian Club of War Prisoners Put in Camps with Typhus-Stricken Russians. CHILDREN TAUGHT SAVAGERY Ambassador Saw Them Shoot Prisoners with Arrows Tipped with Nails. CANADA APPEALS TO US Sir. Wm. H. Hearst, Ontario's Premier, Says Germany Is About to Make a Terrible Death Struggle. To Jail for Giving Food. Prisoners Put With Typhus Patients. Every Man Has a Duty. Canada and America United. U-Boat Situation "Uncomfortable."
